meanings.definition: A private cabin or compartment on a ship or train for passengers.
meanings.sent1: The staterooms on the cruise ship were cozy and had a nice view of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Passengers can relax in their staterooms after a long day of exploring the ship.
meanings.sent3: The staterooms were like little hideaways from the bustling activities on the ship.
meanings.sent4: In the staterooms, passengers could escape the noise and enjoy some peaceful moments.
meanings.sent5: The colorful curtains in the staterooms added a cheerful touch to the cozy space.

meanings.definition: A private room on a ship or train for VIPs or high-ranking officials.
meanings.sent1: The luxurious staterooms on the yacht were reserved for the VIP guests.
meanings.sent2: High-ranking officials enjoyed the privacy of their exclusive staterooms during the voyage.
meanings.sent3: The staterooms for VIPs were equipped with elegant furnishings and amenities.
meanings.sent4: The staterooms for high-ranking officials were like mini palaces on the ship.
meanings.sent5: The VIP staterooms were designed for utmost comfort and luxury during the journey.
